meta_description: East End Arts Council supports creativity through arts education, exhibitions, and community programs that inspire artists of all ages and backgrounds.
admission_text:
# East End Arts Council Membership

Join the artists, musicians, makers, appreciators, and supporters that make the East End Arts Council community so special.

[ Join/Renew (1 Annual Payment) ](https://eearts.humanitru.com/membership?page=membership-page-3d6bc436-e078-46f9-9cdb-52a5fe92a961&tribute=true&address=required&membership_tier_ids=226%2C196%2C229%2C197%2C232%2C198%2C363%2C419&locale=en)

[ Join/Renew (12 Monthly Payments) ](https://eearts.humanitru.com/membership?page=membership-page-3d6bc436-e078-46f9-9cdb-52a5fe92a961&tribute=true&address=required&membership_tier_ids=228%2C227%2C231%2C230%2C234%2C233%2C420&locale=en)

## Membership Options:

### Supporter of the Arts

**Unlock your inner creativity and help us build support for art in the community.**

#### Benefits

Enjoy Exclusive Member Pricing on:

  * EEA School classes + workshops 
  * EEA School private music lessons 
  * Qualifying EEA Gallery & ShopEEA.com art purchases 
  * EEA School music studio space (By appointment only. Piano on location) 
  * EEA Carriage House Recording Studio + in-house sound engineer 
  * EEA Carriage House Printing Press (with certification) 
  * EEA Art or Show Sale submission 
  * EEA Community Mosaic Festival exhibitor’s booth 
  * EEA special events & shows

In addition, members enjoy: 

  * Access to Member Open Art Studio time:
    * September – June: Member Studio Hours are Tuesdays 10:00 am to 3:00 pm
    * July and August: Member Studio Hours are Tuesdays 4:00 pm to 7:...

#### **[Classes& Workshops](https://eastendarts.org/education/)  
**

See all group instruction for visual arts, music,  
and writing.

#### **[Main Galleries](https://eastendarts.org/exhibition/)  
**

Visit the current fine art exhibitions in the heart of Downtown Riverhead.

#### **[Satellite](https://eastendarts.org/satellite-galleries/)[Galleries](https://eastendarts.org/satellite-galleries/)  
**

View Member artwork in public spaces of local business partners.

#### **[Arts For ALL](https://eastendarts.org/arts-for-all/)  
**

Learn about our educational programs designed for all abilities.

#### **[Art School](https://eastendarts.org/teen-adult-art/)  
**

Register for private visual art lessons and group programs for all ages.

#### **[Music School](https://eastendarts.org/music/)  
**

Register for private music lessons and group programs for all ages.  

#### **[Upcoming Events](https://eastendarts.org/all-event-calendar/)  
**

Check out the calendar of art openings, talks, concerts, and more.  

#### **[Recording Studio](https://eastendarts.org/recording-studio/)  
**

Record, mix, and master your music, audiobook, podcast, or film.
